title: New Oce team LFM
body:
**Clan name: AlphaPak
Clan tag: AlphaP**

Clan name is up for suggestion once I get the team together

Hey everyone I have been playing league since season 3 and I have finally decided to make a team.
I don't want to make a team that becomes dead in a month.
I want to make a team that will last for a long time, and have active members that is willing to take time and practice with the team 3-7 hours a day.
I know some people have a few days off for holidays and what not but that's fine, I want active members who play this game 5-7 days a week.
Also looking for a "manager" that will set up the team for tournaments. ( you can also do this if you're a team member)
-REQUIREMENT-
Platinum 3< 
Working microphone + Skype/Team speak
play the game 5-7 days a week 3-7 hours a day
good internet (good ping, no frequent disconnecting)

-Please fill this out if you are interested-
I have been playing this game for:
1st, 2nd,  preferred roles:
Champion pool for the lanes:
Play tournaments: Y/N
Manager role : Y/N

TOP: -
JUNGLE: -
MID: fegit (Platinum 2)
ADC: - Tarawa (Platinum 3)
SUPPORT: -

SUB: -
SUB: -

My champion pool
Velkoz, Xerath, Jayce, Zed, Syndra

I will be editing this every 1-2 days and keep you guys updated

replies.body:
Hi guy, been playing this game for 2 years
1st pref: Jungle
2Nd pref: Top
Champion pool for jg:  Often : Jarvan, Lee, Eve, Fiddlestick, Vi Sometimes:  Elise, Xin, Yi, Shyv, Vi, Amu, Udyr
Champion pool for top: Irelia, Jayce, Malzahar, Mundo, Wuk and everychamp playable top.
Prefs mid: Malzahar Syndra Katarina LB Fizz
Prefs ADC: Vayne, Caitlyn
Prefs Support: Blitz Karma Thresh Fiddlesticks Morgana and Annie
Im very active, got a micrphone with teamspeak / skype

add me ingame: M3 SO HORNY
Im only plat 5 but i would be glad to have a trial please, so you can see :/

i can nearly do every lane depending on the team comp and the team work that goes along with it please contact me happy to join and looking for some serious gaming and to win.. Any lane is fine with me even support. Champion Pool be - yasuo, zed, kat= main,thresh,lee sin,jinx,shaco,riven.

Jungle= lee sin, shaco, xin zhao.
Top Lane= Riven, nasus, xin, vayne, singed, fiora etc mostly all top laners i can do.
Mid Lane= Kat main, zed, yasuo, veigar, syndra,Leblanc.
Bot/adc= vyane, lucian, twitch, jinx, Miss fortune, graves,Ezreal.
Support= Thresh,Lelbanc,Leona.

PLz contact me Woljin OCE server :) cant wait.

Stable FPS 60 and up was s3 now s4 but m still climbing and not giving up.

I have been playing this game for: 3 years, around 4k games played

1st, 2nd, preferred roles: Jungle and then Top

Champion pool for the lanes: Jungle: Warwick, Amumu, Fiddlesticks, Yi, Xin, etc
                                                       Top: Fiora, Singed, Nasus, Kat, Malphite, Riven, etc
I can play most champs not just the ones listed.

Play tournaments: Yes

Manager role : No

Currently Gold 1 but have only just started playing ranked again seriously and am climbing quickly. You won't be disappointed if you do decide to give me a try out. Cheers!
np ill give u a trial
no problem brah, ill chuck u a add and once i have a team ill give it a trial and see from there.
